titles.title: Blessed be the name of the lord most high

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Blessed be the name of the Lord,
Blessed be the name of the Lord,
Blessed be the name of the Lord most High!
Blessed be the name of the Lord,
Blessed be the name of the Lord,
Blessed be the name of the Lord most High!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The name of the Lord is a strong tower,
The righteous run into Him and they are safe!
The name of the Lord is a strong tower,
The righteous run into Him and they are safe!
